attributes.title: WORST APP IN THE HISTORY OF APPS
attributes.review: All I wanted to do was support my president. But the app wouldn’t load, and then when it finally did it kicked me out. Unbelievable. They also made all my other apps on my device do the same thing.

attributes.title: I would like to speak with your manager
attributes.review:
This app took a very long time to download, while downloading my communications device kept popping up notifications saying i was downloading a virus.

          Sincerely,
                    Karen

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: this app is TERRIBLE i thought i was getting a fun app then i see some elderly guy that looks like a cheeto on it and not to mention it lags and glitches out the whole time it’s just a bad app i wouldn’t want anyone else to have

attributes.title: Never download this app
attributes.review: This app took forever to download and when I go on the app it immediately kicks me off and says that they are unavailable to open and process the app 😡🤬

attributes.title: terribleeeee 🤮🤮🤮🤮
attributes.review: i would never recommend this app. the quality is terrible. its so bad that when I called the company they guy who spoke (john smith) said he thought this too and that he will report the app himself and quit the job. 🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮

attributes.title: Horrible app!!!
attributes.review: I am appalled of how horrible this app is! 😡 it constantly crashes and keeps showing an orange on the screen! I just want to keep up to date with my president and it’s doing nothing but this!! DONT RECOMMEND

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: Horrible service no matter where I am, poor information. Excludes information about Trump that the people really need to know. Would never recommend the app.

attributes.title: orange man
attributes.review: this app is TERRIBLE i had to see the face of a man that is so hideous and makes me vomit!!! i can’t belive they don’t have a warning. also we’ve all seen the cheeto puff shlong that this man has so i also laugh when i see him. therefore idek blm, acab 😛😛 #savetiktok

attributes.title: WASTE OF MY STORAGE!
attributes.review: this app is terrible. made my phone glitch and now i wish i would never have gotten it. it has come to my attention that this app is for old people and people who don’t need phones. period. 🧖🏻‍♀️

attributes.title: What a stoopid app
attributes.review: This app is so slow that it hurts my brain every time I even try to open it!! This app is so dumb💀 the thing literally runs like my Nintendo 64 and my blackberry flip phone I don’t recommend this app at all
